{
  "explanation": "The description involves collecting visitor behavior information on multiple websites to optimize advertisement relevance. This closely matches purposes related to advertising and behaviour analysis. Specifically, 'Advertising' and 'Targeted Advertising' deal with showing ads based on gathered data, while 'Service Usage Analytics' involves the analysis of visitor behavior to improve services. 'Personalised Advertising' is also highly relevant as it focuses on tailoring ads based on collected information. These purposes align well with the objective of optimizing ad relevance using visitor data.",

}
```
